title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: When updating the checkboxes for exporting a zip file, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) and there is no indication that the update is in progress. The busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, there is no indication that the update is in progress.
EB: During the update process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the export zip functionality.
2. Attempt to update the checked state of the table.
3. Notice that there is no busy cursor shown.
